doc: Penélope Cruz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pen%C3%A9lope_Cruz 1 Penélope Cruz Sánchez (; Spanish: [peˈnelope kɾuθ ˈsantʃeθ]; born 28 April 1974) is a Spanish actress and model. Signed by an agent at the age of 15, she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her feature film debut the following year in Jamón Jamón (1992). Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes (1997), The Hi-Lo Country (1999), The Girl of Your Dreams (2000) and Woman on Top (2000). Cruz achieved recognition for her lead roles in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky, All the Pretty Horses, Captain Corelli's Mandolin and Blow. She has since appeared in films in a range of genres, including the comedy Waking Up in Reno (2002), the thriller Gothika (2003), the Christmas film Noel (2004), the action-adventure films Sahara (2005) and Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides (2011), the romantic comedy To Rome with Love (2012), the crime drama The Counselor (2013) and the mystery film Murder on the Orient Express (2017). She was praised for her roles in Volver (2006) and Nine (2009), receiving Golden Globe and Academy Award nominations for each. She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2008 for playing volatile painter María Elena in Woody Allen's Vicky Cristina Barcelona. She was the first Spanish actress in history to receive an Academy Award and the first Spanish actress to receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. In 2018, Cruz made her American television debut as Italian fashion designer Donatella Versace in the FX series The Assassination of Gianni Versace: American Crime Story and received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination for her role. Cruz has modelled for Mango, Ralph Lauren and L'Oréal, and along with her younger sister Mónica Cruz, has designed clothing for Mango. Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and India, where she spent one week working with Mother Teresa; she donated her salary from The Hi-Lo Country to help fund the late nun's mission. Penélope_Cruz_Sánchez ( ; Spanish : [_peˈnelope_kɾuθ_ˈsantʃeθ_] ; born_28_April_1974 ) is a_Spanish_actress_and_model . Signed by an_agent at the_age of 15 , she made her_acting_debut at 16 on television and her_feature_film_debut the_following_year in Jamón_Jamón_(_1992_) . Her_subsequent_roles in the_1990s_and_2000s included Open_Your_Eyes ( 1997_) , The_Hi-Lo_Country_(_1999_) , The_Girl of Your_Dreams ( 2000_) and Woman on Top_(_2000_) . Cruz achieved recognition for her_lead_roles in the_2001_films Vanilla_Sky , All the_Pretty_Horses , Captain_Corelli 's_Mandolin_and_Blow . She has since appeared in films in a_range of genres , including the_comedy Waking Up in Reno_(_2002_) , the_thriller Gothika_(_2003_) , the_Christmas_film_Noel_(_2004_) , the_action-adventure_films Sahara_(_2005_)_and_Pirates of the_Caribbean : On Stranger_Tides_(_2011_) , the_romantic_comedy To Rome with Love_(_2012_) , the_crime_drama The_Counselor_(_2013_) and the_mystery_film_Murder on the_Orient_Express ( 2017_) . She was_praised for her_roles in Volver_(_2006_) and Nine_(_2009_) , receiving Golden_Globe_and_Academy_Award_nominations for each . She won the_Academy_Award for Best Supporting_Actress in 2008 for playing volatile_painter_María_Elena in Woody_Allen 's_Vicky_Cristina_Barcelona . She was the_first_Spanish_actress in history to_receive an_Academy_Award and the_first_Spanish_actress to_receive a_star on the_Hollywood_Walk of Fame . In 2018 , Cruz made her_American_television_debut as Italian_fashion_designer_Donatella_Versace in the_FX_series The_Assassination of Gianni_Versace : American_Crime_Story and received a_Primetime_Emmy_Award_nomination for her_role . Cruz has_modelled for Mango , Ralph_Lauren and L'Oréal , and along with her_younger_sister_Mónica_Cruz , has_designed clothing for Mango . Cruz has_volunteered in Uganda_and_India , where she spent one_week working with Mother_Teresa ; she donated her_salary from The_Hi-Lo_Country to_help_fund the_late_nun 's_mission . 'B', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'I', 'I', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'I', 'O'] {PERSON[Penélope_Cruz_Sánchez]} ( ; Spanish : [ peˈnelope kɾuθ ˈsantʃeθ ] ; born 28 April 1974 ) is a Spanish actress and model . Signed by an agent at the age of 15 , she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her feature film debut the following year in {PERSON[Jamón_Jamón]} ( 1992 ) . Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes ( 1997 ) , The Hi-Lo Country ( 1999 ) , The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ) . {PERSON[Cruz]} achieved recognition for her lead roles in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky , All the Pretty Horses , Captain {PERSON[Corelli]} 's Mandolin and Blow . She has since appeared in films in a range of genres , including the comedy Waking Up in {PERSON[Reno]} ( 2002 ) , the thriller Gothika ( 2003 ) , the Christmas film {PERSON[Noel]} ( 2004 ) , the action-adventure films Sahara ( 2005 ) and Pirates of the {LOCATION[Caribbean]} : On Stranger Tides ( 2011 ) , the romantic comedy To {LOCATION[Rome]} with Love ( 2012 ) , the crime drama The Counselor ( 2013 ) and the mystery film Murder on the {ORGANIZATION[Orient_Express]} ( 2017 ) . She was praised for her roles in Volver ( 2006 ) and Nine ( 2009 ) , receiving Golden Globe and Academy Award nominations for each . She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2008 for playing volatile painter {PERSON[María_Elena]} in {PERSON[Woody_Allen]} 's {PERSON[Vicky_Cristina_Barcelona]} . She was the first Spanish actress in history to receive an Academy Award and the first Spanish actress to receive a star on the {ORGANIZATION[Hollywood_Walk_of_Fame]} . In 2018 , {PERSON[Cruz]} made her American television debut as Italian fashion designer {PERSON[Donatella_Versace]} in the FX series The Assassination of {PERSON[Gianni_Versace]} : American Crime Story and received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination for her role . {PERSON[Cruz]} has modelled for Mango , {PERSON[Ralph_Lauren]} and L'Oréal , and along with her younger sister {PERSON[Mónica_Cruz]} , has designed clothing for Mango . {PERSON[Cruz]} has volunteered in {LOCATION[Uganda]} and {LOCATION[India]} , where she spent one week working with {PERSON[Mother_Teresa]} ; she donated her salary from The Hi-Lo Country to help fund the late nun 's mission . {PERSON[Penélope_Cruz_Sánchez]} ( ; {MISC[Spanish]} : [ peˈnelope kɾuθ ˈsantʃeθ ] ; born 28 April 1974 ) is a {MISC[Spanish]} actress and model . Signed by an agent at the age of 15 , she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her feature film debut the following year in {PERSON[Jamón_Jamón]} ( 1992 ) . Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included {MISC[Open_Your_Eyes]} ( 1997 ) , The {PERSON[Hi-Lo_Country]} ( 1999 ) , {ORGANIZATION[The_Girl_of_Your_Dreams]} ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ) . {PERSON[Cruz]} achieved recognition for her lead roles in the 2001 films {ORGANIZATION[Vanilla_Sky]} , All the {ORGANIZATION[Pretty_Horses]} , Captain {PERSON[Corelli]} 's {LOCATION[Mandolin]} and Blow . She has since appeared in films in a range of genres , including the comedy {LOCATION[Waking_Up]} in {PERSON[Reno]} ( 2002 ) , the thriller {PERSON[Gothika]} ( 2003 ) , the {MISC[Christmas]} film {PERSON[Noel]} ( 2004 ) , the action-adventure films {LOCATION[Sahara]} ( 2005 ) and {ORGANIZATION[Pirates]} of the {LOCATION[Caribbean]} : On {ORGANIZATION[Stranger_Tides]} ( 2011 ) , the romantic comedy To {LOCATION[Rome]} with {PERSON[Love]} ( 2012 ) , the crime drama {ORGANIZATION[The_Counselor]} ( 2013 ) and the mystery film Murder on the {ORGANIZATION[Orient_Express]} ( 2017 ) . She was praised for her roles in Volver ( 2006 ) and Nine ( 2009 ) , receiving {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe]} and {ORGANIZATION[Academy_Award]} nominations for each . She won the {ORGANIZATION[Academy_Award_for_Best_Supporting_Actress]} in 2008 for playing volatile painter {PERSON[María_Elena]} in {PERSON[Woody_Allen]} 's {PERSON[Vicky_Cristina_Barcelona]} . She was the first {MISC[Spanish]} actress in history to receive an {MISC[Academy_Award]} and the first {MISC[Spanish]} actress to receive a star on the {ORGANIZATION[Hollywood_Walk_of_Fame]} . In 2018 , {PERSON[Cruz]} made her {MISC[American]} television debut as {MISC[Italian]} fashion designer {PERSON[Donatella_Versace]} in the FX series The {ORGANIZATION[Assassination_of_Gianni_Versace]} : {ORGANIZATION[American_Crime_Story]} and received a {ORGANIZATION[Primetime_Emmy_Award]} nomination for her role . {PERSON[Cruz]} has modelled for {LOCATION[Mango]} , {PERSON[Ralph_Lauren]} and {PERSON[L'Oréal]} , and along with her younger sister {PERSON[Mónica_Cruz]} , has designed clothing for Mango . {PERSON[Cruz]} has volunteered in {LOCATION[Uganda]} and {LOCATION[India]} , where she spent one week working with {PERSON[Mother_Teresa]} ; she donated her salary from The {LOCATION[Hi-Lo_Country]} to help fund the late nun 's mission . Penélope {PERSON[Cruz_Sánchez]} ( ; Spanish : [ peˈnelope kɾuθ ˈsantʃeθ ] ; born 28 {DATE[April_1974]} ) is a Spanish actress and model . Signed by an agent at the age of 15 , she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her feature film debut the following year in {ORGANIZATION[Jamón_Jamón]} ( {DATE[1992]} ) . Her subsequent roles in the {DATE[1990s]} and {DATE[2000s]} included Open Your Eyes ( {DATE[1997]} ) , The Hi-Lo Country ( {DATE[1999]} ) , The Girl of Your Dreams ( {DATE[2000]} ) and Woman on Top ( {DATE[2000]} ) . Cruz achieved recognition for her lead roles in the {DATE[2001]} films Vanilla Sky , All the Pretty Horses , {ORGANIZATION[Captain_Corelli]} 's Mandolin and Blow . She has since appeared in films in a range of genres , including the comedy Waking Up in Reno ( 2002 ) , the thriller Gothika ( {DATE[2003]} ) , the Christmas film Noel ( {DATE[2004]} ) , the action-adventure films Sahara ( {DATE[2005]} ) and Pirates of the {LOCATION[Caribbean]} : On Stranger Tides ( 2011 ) , the romantic comedy To {LOCATION[Rome]} with Love ( 2012 ) , the crime drama The Counselor ( {DATE[2013]} ) and the mystery film Murder on the {ORGANIZATION[Orient_Express]} ( {DATE[2017]} ) . She was praised for her roles in Volver ( {DATE[2006]} ) and Nine ( {DATE[2009]} ) , receiving {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe]} and {ORGANIZATION[Academy_Award]} nominations for each . She won the {ORGANIZATION[Academy_Award]} for Best Supporting Actress in {DATE[2008]} for playing volatile painter {PERSON[María_Elena]} in {PERSON[Woody_Allen]} 's {PERSON[Vicky_Cristina_Barcelona]} . She was the first Spanish actress in history to receive an {ORGANIZATION[Academy_Award]} and the first Spanish actress to receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame . In {DATE[2018]} , {PERSON[Cruz]} made her American television debut as Italian fashion designer {PERSON[Donatella_Versace]} in the FX series The Assassination of {ORGANIZATION[Gianni_Versace]} : {ORGANIZATION[American_Crime_Story]} and received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination for her role . Cruz has modelled for Mango , {PERSON[Ralph_Lauren]} and L'Oréal , and along with her younger sister {PERSON[Mónica_Cruz]} , has designed clothing for Mango . Cruz has volunteered in {LOCATION[Uganda]} and {LOCATION[India]} , where she spent one week working with Mother Teresa ; she donated her salary from The Hi-Lo Country to help fund the late nun 's mission .
